title: Swarm in Blocks
description: High-level block-based interface for controlling drone swarms (Team Atena, SEMEAR/USP). CopterHack 2022 & 2023: Swarm Station (3D web visualizer, real-time drone state), collision avoidance, ROS/Clover integration. Programming via blocks or Python; planning, simulation, and navigation modes.
